interfaceDocumentationComment.description: This value is placed in a documentation comment for the exported default interface.

valueDocumentationComment.description: This value is placed in a documentation comment for the exported value.

interfaceName.description: The interface name for the default wrapped export. Defaults to "IExport"

interfaceDocumentationComment.description: This value is placed in a documentation comment for the exported default interface.

valueDocumentationComment.description: This value is placed in a documentation comment for the exported value.

inferInterfaceNameFromFilename.description: When set to true, the default export interface name will be inferred from the filename. This takes precedence over the interfaceName option.

srcFolder.description: Source code root directory. Defaults to "src/".

generatedTsFolder.description: Output directory for generated typings. Defaults to "temp/loc-ts/".

secondaryGeneratedTsFolders.description: Additional folders, relative to the project root, where the generated typings should be emitted to.

stringNamesToIgnore.description: An array of string names to ignore when generating typings.
